mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.STOCKINFO_ID as stockInfoId, a.WARRANT_CLASS as warrantClass, a.WARRANT_TYPE as warrantType, a.EXERCISE_PRICE as exercisePrice, a.CREATE_BY as createBy, a.CREATE_DATE as createDate, a.UPDATE_BY as updateBy, a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STOCK_WARRANT( ID , STOCKINFO_ID , WARRANT_CLASS , WARRANT_TYPE , EXERCISE_PRICE , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{stockInfoId} , #{warrantClass} , #{warrantType} , #{exercisePrice} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )

INSERT INTO STOCK_WARRANT
ID ,
STOCKINFO_ID ,
WARRANT_CLASS ,
WARRANT_TYPE ,
EXERCISE_PRICE ,
CREATE_BY ,
CREATE_DATE ,
UPDATE_BY ,
UPDATE_DATE
#{id} ,
#{stockInfoId} ,
#{warrantClass} ,
#{warrantType} ,
#{exercisePrice} ,
#{createBy} ,
#{createDate} ,
#{updateBy} ,
#{updateDate}
mapper.update:
UPDATE STOCK_WARRANT
STOCKINFO_ID = #{stockInfoId} ,
WARRANT_CLASS = #{warrantClass} ,
WARRANT_TYPE = #{warrantType} ,
EXERCISE_PRICE = #{exercisePrice} ,
CREATE_BY = #{createBy} ,
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} ,
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy} ,
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO STOCK_WARRANT( ID , STOCKINFO_ID , WARRANT_CLASS , WARRANT_TYPE , EXERCISE_PRICE , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.stockInfoId} , #{item.warrantClass} , #{item.warrantType} , #{item.exercisePrice} , #{item.createBy} , #{item.createDate} , #{item.updateBy} , #{item.updateDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE STOCK_WARRANT SET STOCKINFO_ID = #{item.stockInfoId} , WARRANT_CLASS = #{item.warrantClass} , WARRANT_TYPE = #{item.warrantType} , EXERCISE_PRICE = #{item.exercisePrice} , CREATE_BY = #{item.createBy} , CREATE_DATE = #{item.createDate} , UPDATE_BY = #{item.updateBy} , UPDATE_DATE = #{item.updateDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE STOCK_WARRANT SET STOCKINFO_ID = #{stockInfoId} , WARRANT_CLASS = #{warrantClass} , WARRANT_TYPE = #{warrantType} , EXERCISE_PRICE = #{exercisePrice} , CREATE_BY = #{createBy} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy} , UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM STOCK_WARRANT a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT a.STOCK_SYMBOL as stockSymbol, a.BASE_CURRENCY as baseCurrency, b.WARRANT_CLASS as warrantClass, b.WARRANT_TYPE as warrantType, b.EXERCISE_PRICE as exercisePrice, c.QUOTE_DATE as quoteDate, c.PREV_CLOSE as prevClose, c.BID as bid, c.ASK as ask, c.BID_SIZE as bidSize, c.ASK_SIZE as askSize FROM STOCK_INFO a LEFT JOIN STOCK_WARRANT b ON a.ID = b.STOCKINFO_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.*, row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY t.STOCKINFO_ID ORDER BY t.QUOTE_DATE DESC) RN FROM QUOTE_WARRANT t) WHERE RN = 1 ) c ON c.STOCKINFO_ID = a.ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.STOCK_TYPE = 'warrant' AND b.WARRANT_CLASS = #{warrantClass}
